Sadly there's currently no code in BDA that supports any kind of turret firing missiles or rockets. This is why LordPrometheus is having trouble making a realistic TOW missile turret, because missiles can only be parts and rocket pods are fixed and there is no code to support anything else, until perhaps the functionality is added in the next BDA update, but that could take a while.
